title: It's National Margarita Day! Celebrate with one of Greater Cleveland's best margaritas (photos)
text: It's National Margarita Day and if you are in the mood to celebrate, here are the Top 9 margaritas in Northeast Ohio, as voted recently by cleveland,com readers.
